body:
Comment 22: 
Thanks.

I know you said that you had GOARM=5 set in your
environment, but this assembly dump makes it look
very much like you didn't when this gotest binary
was created.

Try

cd $GOROOT/src/cmd/gotest
make
./gotest  # works, I believe
make install
which gotest

And double-check that make install is writing to the
same place that which is looking.

Thanks.
Russ
